org.xbib.elasticsearch.websocket

Class InteractiveController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractLifecycleComponent<InteractiveController>
        • org.xbib.elasticsearch.websocket.InteractiveController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.elasticsearch.common.component.CloseableComponent, org.elasticsearch.common.component.LifecycleComponent<InteractiveController>

    public class InteractiveController
extends org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractLifecycleComponent<InteractiveController>
    The InteractiveController controls the presence of websocket connections and the flow of websocket frames for interactive use.
